name: Two Taps Racer
description:
Train your brain! Press the play button & control the cars.

Watch every steps. Don't hit any other cars.

How to Play:

Desktop:

Press left or right to control both cars.

Android:

Touch left & right side of screen to control both cars.

Any suggestions? leave a comment :)

Source: https://github.com/khairul169/two-taps-racer
